docs.text:
Welcome to MkDocs


For full documentation visit 
mkdocs.org
.


Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
H5VZR - Frontend


Requirements


{
  
node
: 
=0.12

}




Set up your environment


Install prerequisites


# Update npm
npm install -g npm

# Install yo
npm install -g grunt-cli bower yo generator-karma generator-angular




Install npm and bower deps


# cd into h5vzr
cd h5vr

# npm deps
npm install

# bower deps
bower install

# loopback services (requires api prerequisites)
lb-ng ../api/server/server.js app/scripts/services/lb-services.js




Useage


# serve
grunt serve

# build
grunt build

# test
npm test




Further Help: 
Yeoman Guide
docs.title: H5VZR

docs.text:
Install prerequisites  # Update npm
npm install -g npm

# Install yo
npm install -g grunt-cli bower yo generator-karma generator-angular  Install npm and bower deps  # cd into h5vzr
cd h5vr

# npm deps
npm install

# bower deps
bower install

# loopback services (requires api prerequisites)
lb-ng ../api/server/server.js app/scripts/services/lb-services.js  Useage  # serve
grunt serve

# build
grunt build

# test
npm test  Further Help:  Yeoman Guide
docs.title: Set up your environment

docs.text:
API - Backend


Requirements


{
  
node
: 
=0.12
,
  
mongodb
: 
=2.6

}




Set up your environment


Install prerequisites


Install MongoDB: 
Offical Guide


# Update npm if you haven't already
npm install -g npm

# Install loopback
npm install -g strongloop




Install npm deps


# cd into api
cd api

# npm deps
npm install




Useage


# start mongodb daemon (in separate window/tab)
mongod

# run
node .




Further Help: 
Strongloop Guide
docs.title: API

docs.text:
Install prerequisites  Install MongoDB:  Offical Guide  # Update npm if you haven't already
npm install -g npm

# Install loopback
npm install -g strongloop  Install npm deps  # cd into api
cd api

# npm deps
npm install  Useage  # start mongodb daemon (in separate window/tab)
mongod

# run
node .  Further Help:  Strongloop Guide
docs.title: Set up your environment

docs.text:
RASPI - Metering Unit


Requirements


{
  
python
: 
=2.7

}




Set up your environment


Install prerequisites


# cd into raspi
cd raspi

# optionally use a virtualenv
pip install --upgrade virtualenv
virtualenv .env
source .env/bin/activate

# python deps
pip install --upgrade -r requirements.txt




Compile sensor scripts:


# cd into raspi/sensors
cd sensors

# compile scripts in raspi/sensors
make




Usage


# run
python run.py

# run config server
python run.py --config

# run emu sensor script (for test usages)
python run.py --emu
docs.title: raspi

docs.text:

cd raspi

# optionally use a virtualenv
pip install --upgrade virtualenv
virtualenv .env
source .env/bin/activate

# python deps

cd sensors

# compile scripts in raspi/sensors

python run.py

# run config server
python run.py --config

# run emu sensor script (for test usages)
python run.py --emu
